description: Advanced training in head & neck anatomy & oral biology & histology. Builds on material covered in BDSc Year 1 & explores this in greater detail, with greater relevance to clinical dentistry. Knowledge obtained will provide a foundation for the move into clinical dentistry in Years 2 & 3. Emphasis is on providing the student with a sound clinical understanding that underpins diagnosis of important oral diseases.
prerequisites: BIOL1040 + CHEM1022 + DENT1030 + DENT1011 + ORAL1010 + ORAL1020 + ORAL1030 + ORAL1050
